sentence.Network_en: This letter is significative of her affection.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词汇新译 S_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... signification 含义 significative 有意义的 signify 表示.
So it is significative to carry temperature creep characteristic of propeller shaft ., 所以对螺旋桨尾轴进行蠕变分析是十分有意义的.
significative 为提供确定证据的, significative 意味深长的, significative 意义
But this year i have done a significative thing ---- going out to work ., 不过今年我做了一件很有意义的事情 -- 出去工作.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French significatif, -ive or late Latin significativus (see signify)
